duties_responsibilities.duty: Own operational readiness of new and existing Cloud Learning services and offerings
Collaborate with organization’s Offer Practice Leads and the Order Fulfillment teams to stress test all offerings for internal and external customers
Be a thought leader/Subject Matter Expert in training delivery to drive process improvements
Advise account teams on agreement structure, business motion, pricing, funding options, pitch decks, and approval of quotes
Manage delivery accuracy with a customer-first approach, ensuring compliance and unnecessary intervention by non-operational teams

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in a technical field, or equivalent practical experience
